caption.title: Please take a few minutes to answer the following questions

tr.style: border-width: 0px 0px 1pt 0px ; border-style: none none solid none

tr.td: How did the onset of your olfactory dysfunction happen?
Did you have olfactory dysfunction along with gustatory dysfunction?
Have you had any flu or cold symptoms (fever, rhinorrhea, cough, and sore throat) before anosmia?
Have you had a severe headache that needed a pain reliever drug?
Have you had fever and chills/ severe cough/ dyspnea before or during the olfactory dysfunction?
Did you smell the natural odors as unpleasant smells?
Rate your ability to smell during the first days of your olfactory dysfunction.
Rate your ability to taste during the first days of your olfactory dysfunction.
How many days have you had olfactory dysfunction?
Rate your ability to smell right now (at the time of filling this questionnaire).
Rate your ability to taste right now (at the time of filling this questionnaire).
Did you use any medication for your olfactory dysfunction?
How was the pattern of your olfactory dysfunction?
Did you get any nasal surgery such as previous sinus surgery or septorhinoplasty?
Rate the negative effect of your olfactory dysfunction on your quality of life.

Which ones did you have along with your olfactory dysfunction? Nasal stiffness Nasal pruritus Nasal irritation Sneezing (frequent) Rhinorrhea Purulent nasal discharge Cheeks pain Facial fullness and sinus pain Orbital (periorbital) pain Sore throat Otalgia Unilateral facial palsy
